parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the alternator/battery system can cause the vehicle to suddenly lose power, leading to a loss of electrical systems, transmission, and steering, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly loses power while driving
error codes appear on the dashboard (e.g.
"electrical system maintenance malfunction" and "vehicle starting system malfunction")
the transmission and steering wheel lock up
the vehicle shuts down abruptly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed Recall Repair for Fuel System Issue
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delayed availability of parts for the recall repair can lead to a prolonged period of driving a vehicle with a potentially faulty fuel system, which can increase the risk of fuel leaks, fires, and accidents.
symptoms: None reported
as the issue is related to the recall repair process rather than a specific vehicle malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning central locking system can lead to unauthorized access to the vehicle, compromising the safety of occupants and their belongings, and increasing the risk of accidents and theft.
symptoms: The door locking system indicates either open doors or locked doors that can still be opened
inconsistent door locking behavior
failure to lock or unlock doors
compromising the security of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Backup Camera and 360 Camera Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inconsistent operation of the rear backup camera and 360 cameras can cause difficulty in backing up the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The rear backup camera and 360 cameras do not work consistently
resulting in incomplete visibility while backing up
making it difficult to maneuver the vehicle safely.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The steering wheel suddenly turns to the right
the vehicle pulls hard to the right
the vehicle jumps the curb
the vehicle crashes
the passenger side air pressure monitoring system randomly becomes activated
the instrument panel lights up indicating a low tire warning or damage on the right front tire
but no flat tire or damage is found.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the TPMS can cause the driver to be distracted, leading to accidents, and can also cause the vehicle to lose control due to incorrect tire pressure.
symptoms: The instrument panel lights up indicating a low tire warning or damage on the right front tire
but no flat tire or damage is found
the TPMS randomly becomes activated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loosening of the steering shaft bolt can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The steering wheel suddenly turns to the right
the vehicle pulls hard to the right
the vehicle jumps the curb
the vehicle crashes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning driver assistance system can cause sudden and unnecessary braking or acceleration, which can lead to accidents, rear-end collisions, or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly slams on the brakes without reason
the vehicle accelerates heavily without warning
the system fails to provide distance warnings or adaptive cruise control
the system malfunctions when towing a trailer.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Radar System Calibration Issue with Trailer Towing
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The radar system calibration issue can cause the pre-sense warning system to malfunction, disabling distance warnings and adaptive cruise control, which can increase the risk of accidents when towing a trailer.
symptoms: The pre-sense warning system activates unnecessarily after 45 minutes of driving with a trailer
the system fails to provide distance warnings or adaptive cruise control
the issue persists even after removing the trailer
the issue requires a new calibration of the radar system at an Audi dealer.
